glsa.title: X.Org: Buffer overflow in XRender extension
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in the XRender extension potentially allows any X.Org user to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

background.p: X.Org is X.Org Foundation's public implementation of the X Window System.

description.p: X.Org miscalculates the size of a buffer in the XRender extension.

impact.p: An X.Org user could exploit this issue to make the X server execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All X.Org users should upgrade to the latest version:
